edge_1: James Gordon kept Harvey Dent's killing spree a secret and allowed the blame for his crimes to fall on Batman.
edge_2: The death of Harvey Dent led to the eradication of organized crime in Gotham City through the Dent Act.

edge_2: Bruce Wayne is still mourning the death of Rachel Dawes.
